Olfactory bulb (main) Blanes cell.Located in: Olfactory bulb main granule cell layer,
Synonym: Olfactory bulb (main) deep short axon cell
Olfactory bulb (main) Blanes cell.LocationOfAxonArborization: Olfactory bulb main granule cell layer,
DefiningCitation: B. W. Blanes cells mediate persistent feedforward inhibition onto granule cells in the olfactory bulb.  Neuron 49 (6): 889-904
Olfactory bulb (main) Blanes cell.Comment: Persistent firing (about 6.3 Hz) for up to 15-min after activation
Olfactory bulb (main) Blanes cell.EditorialNote: Preferred label:  Olfactory bulb main short axon cell deep
Olfactory bulb (main) Blanes cell.SubcellularSynapticTarget: Dendritic spines of distal apical dendrites of granule cell
Olfactory bulb (main) Blanes cell.Definition: Large, stellate-shaped short axon cell in the granule cell layer of the main olfactory bulb.
